Fast forward to high school graduation, she transfers back to Japan for uni WITH her alpha chad bf from Murica, meets up with him and acts like what they did together in that infirmary never happened. He begins to feel jealous and asks who that is and brings up the past. She apologises and says she's with the chad now and that his dick is bigger than his and loves the chad more than the shota, and told him to forget everything that happened that night with him. I'll just explain what Cuckhold actually is since a lot of people seem to misinterpret the meaning.  Of course you can just look up the actual definition but I feel that that wont explain it in context.

Cuckhold has two types, one is where the husband will try to get his wife to sleep with another man but wishes to watch it since the feeling will give him pleasure and the other type is what is mostly called Netorare is the exact opposite, usually having the the wife stolen by another man through some form of horrible humiliation, shame, degradation, etc...  I have noticed the "Cheating" tag which is actually just another form of this feeling but in reverse usually called Netori but Netori has a few bad cases as well, it all depends on how the author makes you feel about the protagonist.

@Virus123- Netorare is the full name and it means cuckoldry in English terms... It's when the person you love cheats on you in the worst way possible and sometimes rubs it in your face... For a full blown example, go watch the hentai Otome Dori.
